fields.name: Ripple Breathing
fields.description: +1d to resist poison, fatigue, or fear. Once per score, push yourself with no stress cost.

fields.name: Overdrive
fields.description: Spend 1 stress to charge a strike. +1 effect and +1 harm vs bizarre, undead, or inorganic targets.

fields.name: Ripple Infusion
fields.description: Spend 1 stress to imbue an object with Ripple energy for the scene. Gains +1 effect vs bizarre enemies.

fields.name: Scarlet Overdrive
fields.description: Ignite a weapon or limb. +1 harm and inflicts fire-based secondary effects. Foes must resist or catch fire.

fields.name: Ripple Detector
fields.description: +1 effect to Study or Survey when using liquid, mist, or blood as a conduit.

fields.name: Zoom Punch
fields.description: Make a melee strike at +1 zone distance. +1d when attacking from unexpected angles or cover.

fields.name: Forced Ripple Breathing
fields.description: Once per score, stabilize a dying ally or let them make a Hamon action even while unconscious.

fields.name: Ripple Cutter
fields.description: Spit or project fluid charged with Ripple. Ranged, armor-piercing. On a 6, start a 4-tick "Slice" clock.

fields.name: Send≈ç Overdrive
fields.description: Strike bizarre targets through walls or barriers. On a 6, begin a "Contact Clock" (4 ticks) to bypass cover.

fields.name: Metal Silver Overdrive
fields.description: Ripple conducts through metallic weapons. +1 effect when using chains, blades, or wire tools.

fields.name: Ripple Hypnosis
fields.description: Once per score, with skin contact, suggest a command or surface a forgotten memory. Target resists with Resolve.

fields.name: Sunlight Yellow Overdrive
fields.description: Spend 1 stress to unleash a radiant barrage. +1 harm and +1 effect vs undead or constructs.
